editions.flavor: The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The tides and waves thrash again as serpent and tortoise entwined awaken from their slumber.
The tides and waves thrash again as serpent and tortoise entwined awaken from their slumber.

effect: **On Enter:** Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Convalescing waves cascade through the soul, revitalizing the body and mind from the depths.
name: Spirit of Water
effect_html: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

editions.flavor: The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.
The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.
Auspicious fortune and good tidings follow the silver tiger on its fleet-footed journey through seasons.

effect: **On Enter:** Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Turbulent zephyrs swirl around the soul, inspiring fleet-footed dreams and expedited efficiency.
name: Spirit of Wind
effect_html: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

editions.flavor: "Why fight to die when you can fight to live?"
"Why fight to die when you can fight to live?"

effect: **Inherited Effect** — Whenever CARDNAME attacks with a Polearm weapon and/or Polearm attack card, target Horse or Human ally you control gets +1 [POWER] until end of turn. *(Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)*

editions.flavor: "A lily pad is but a weed in a pond of lotuses."
"A lily pad is but a weed in a pond of lotuses."

effect: **On Enter:** You gain the Shifting Currents mastery. *(Players can only have one mastery. The Shifting Currents mastery has four modes: North, South, East, and West. Some cards benefit from certain directions of Shifting Currents. Starts in the North direction.)*
effect_raw: On Enter: You gain the Shifting Currents mastery. (Players can only have one mastery. The Shifting Currents mastery has four modes: North, South, East, and West. Some cards benefit from certain directions of Shifting Currents. Starts in the North direction.)
name: Kongming, Wayward Maven

result_editions.flavor: "A lily pad is but a weed in a pond of lotuses."

rule.description: Shifting Mastery is not an object and cannot be targeted by any effects.

effect_html: On Enter: You gain the Shifting Currents mastery. (Players can only have one mastery. The Shifting Currents mastery has four modes: North, South, East, and West. Some cards benefit from certain directions of Shifting Currents. Starts in the North direction.)

effect:
**Kongming Lineage** *(Kongming, Ascetic Vice must be leveled from a previous level "Kongming" champion.)* 

**On Enter:** **Empower 3**.

**Inherited Effect** — Whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing North to South, draw a card.
effect_raw:
Kongming Lineage (Kongming, Ascetic Vice must be leveled from a previous level "Kongming" champion.) 

On Enter: Empower 3.

Inherited Effect — Whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing North to South, draw a card.
name: Kongming, Ascetic Vice

effect:
**Kongming Lineage**

**On Enter:** **Recover X**, where **X** is the amount of tera element cards in your banishment.

Whenever you activate a Spell card, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to an adjacent direction of your choice.
effect_raw:
Kongming Lineage

On Enter: Recover X, where X is the amount of tera element cards in your banishment.

Whenever you activate a Spell card, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to an adjacent direction of your choice.
name: Kongming, Fel Eidolon

rule.description: Changing adjacent directions means the currents can only go one step in a cardinal direction. For example, north can go either east or west whereas east can only go north or south.

effect_html: Kongming LineageOn Enter: Recover X, where X is the amount of tera element cards in your banishment.Whenever you activate a Spell card, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to an adjacent direction of your choice.

editions.flavor: The imperial treasury lies unclaimed. Both avaricious and ambitious covet the wealth hidden within.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Each player draws a card.
effect_raw: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
flavor: Glittering trinkets, coins, and treasures. Plenty enough to be shared among friend and foe alike.
name: Bauble of Abundance

result_editions.flavor: The imperial treasury lies unclaimed. Both avaricious and ambitious covet the wealth hidden within.

effect_html: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.

effect:
*(Weapon — Enters the field with two **durability** counters. Weapons allow your champion to perform an attack, and can be used along with an attack card.)*

[Jin Bonus] **On Kill**: Put a **durability** counter on CARDNAME. *(Apply this effect only if your champion is Jin.)*
effect_raw:
(Weapon — Enters the field with two durability counters. Weapons allow your champion to perform an attack, and can be used along with an attack card.)

[Jin Bonus] On Kill: Put a durability counter on Executioner's Spear. (Apply this effect only if your champion is Jin.)
name: Executioner's Spear

rule.description: A durability counter is removed on the resolution of the damage step. Before the On Kill ability of Executioner's Spear resolves, the weapon is checked for destruction due to zero durability counters.

effect_html: (Weapon — Enters the field with two durability counters. Weapons allow your champion to perform an attack, and can be used along with an attack card.)Jin Bonus On Kill: Put a durability counter on Executioner's Spear. (Apply this effect only if your champion is Jin.)

editions.flavor:
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk." — Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn

effect:
As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish a **preserved** card from your material deck.

**On Enter:** Banish any amount of Spell cards from your graveyard.

[REST]**:** You may play a card banished by CARDNAME. Activate this ability only at slow speed.

As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish a preserved card from your material deck.

On Enter: Banish any amount of Spell cards from your graveyard.

REST: You may play a card banished by Coronal of Rejuvenation. Activate this ability only at slow speed.

rule.description: You may play the card was was banished for the materialization cost with the rest ability. This is also true for any floating memory or cards in memory used to pay for its materialization costs.

editions.flavor: The collapse of the reigning dynasty has left a power vacuum, open for any warlord or general to grasp.
"I will carve out my legacy into Aesan soil with steel. Let this bloodshed sate this endless hunger for war."
